title: Hacked Account
body: Classic riot support taking a million years to respond to my request, but my account has been hacked, charged two separate transactions of $100 and then transferred to another region. If a rioter sees this, PLEASE contact me or reply to this post. I have changed the password on my paypal so I can't be charged more, but I still need my account back and I need to be refunded the two transactions.

replies.body:
If you've already submitted a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for an account recovery, the only thing can be done is to wait. We're pretty slammed with tickets at the moment, so we're working through them as fast as we can. One of our account specialists will assist you as soon as it's possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
been 6 days without a peep from you guys... Where are we...

Sorry for the delayed reply, I was out for a few days. For your specific concerns about your account, we'll be able to address those in your ticket when an account specialist is assigned to your ticket. I think by now you should have reached someone, but if not, feel free to provide me your ticket number so I can take a look and ensure it was submitted successfully.
The ticket number is #23361794. It is still unanswered. Please help me out here.

I can no longer log into the Insomnyac account, this is one of my alternate accounts (Insomnyac backwards).

I'm okay with waiting so long as I know that whoever took my account will not be charging more to my paypal. I have changed my paypal password and added additional security measures but I'd like to know whether or not these measures will actually keep someone from just clicking on the paypal option in my account again... 

Since my account was seemingly transferred to another region (That is what it tells me when I try to log in on NA), will my rank be reset when it is brought back to NA? 

This may go without saying, but I of course need the $200 in riot points refunded.

Thanks for your help, I was a little agitated by the issue at the time and probably came off rudely, and for that I apologize.
